paper_abstract: This article formulates a -operator Generalised Predictive Control (GPC) framework for models described in state-space: an SS-delta-GPC algorithm. Currently such a description is unavailable, although similar approaches have been made from the perspective of using the discrete gradient approximations as an emulator of the continuous-time system. The SS-delta-GPC algorithm is demonstrated to improve on the round-off errors encountered when using the shift-operator under conditions of fast-sampling and finite word lengths.
paper_title: Predictive control of fast-sampled systems using the delta-operator
